data.comment: The match is underway in Ponta Delgada.
Corner awarded to Maritimo.
In the minute 1, Pedro Pelagio of Maritimo gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Santa Clara at Estadio de Sao Miguel.
Maritimo are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 6, Manuel Mota signals a throw-in for Maritimo, close to Santa Clara's area.
Ball safe as Santa Clara is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Maritimo in their own half.
In the minute 11, Manuel Mota signals a free kick to Santa Clara in their own half.
Maritimo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Santa Clara in their own half.
In the minute 13, Maritimo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Santa Clara have been awarded a corner by Manuel Mota.
Santa Clara awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 16, Can Santa Clara capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Maritimo's half?
Free kick for Santa Clara in the half of Maritimo.
Manuel Mota signals a free kick to Santa Clara.
In the minute 18, Corner awarded to Santa Clara.
Free kick Santa Clara.
Santa Clara's Osama Rashid misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 20, Maritimo have a goal kick.
Santa Clara have been awarded a corner by Manuel Mota.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 21, Manuel Mota signals a Maritimo throw-in in Santa Clara's half.
Manuel Mota awards Santa Clara a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Maritimo goal kick.
In the minute 23, Throw-in for Santa Clara at Estadio de Sao Miguel.
In Ponta Delgada a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Maritimo drive forward but Edgar Costa is judged offside.
In the minute 24, Manuel Mota awards the home team a throw-in.
Can Maritimo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Santa Clara's half?
Maritimo are whistled for offside.
In the minute 25, Throw-in for Maritimo in the half of Santa Clara.
Manuel Mota signals a free kick to Maritimo.
Important block from the Santa Clara defence as Jean fires in a strike for Maritimo.
In the minute 28, Manuel Mota signals a free kick to Maritimo in their own half.
Maritimo to take a throw-in in Santa Clara territory.
Can Maritimo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Santa Clara's half?
In the minute 31, Maritimo have a dangerous throw-in.
Maritimo are pushing forward but Joel's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Ponta Delgada.
In the minute 32, Throw-in Maritimo.
Maritimo needs to be cautious. Santa Clara have an attacking throw-in.
Manuel Mota awards Maritimo a goal kick.
In the minute 35, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Santa Clara are coming forward and Carlos Carvalho gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Maritimo have a goal kick.
In the minute 37, Free kick for Maritimo in the half of Santa Clara.
Maritimo have been awarded a corner by Manuel Mota.
Corner awarded to Maritimo.
In the minute 39, Throw-in for Maritimo in the half of Santa Clara.
Manuel Mota signals a Maritimo throw-in in Santa Clara's half.
Santa Clara awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 41, Free kick Santa Clara.
Free kick for Maritimo in their own half.
Goal kick for Santa Clara at Estadio de Sao Miguel.
In the minute 42, Santa Clara to take a throw-in in Maritimo territory.
Maritimo will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Santa Clara.
In Ponta Delgada Santa Clara attack through Osama Rashid. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 44, Ball goes out of play for a Maritimo goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In Ponta Delgada a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 45, Maritimo have been awarded a corner by Manuel Mota.
Manuel Mota signals a free kick to Santa Clara in their own half.
The fourth official's board shows 1 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Maritimo in their own half.
Manuel Mota blows to end the first-half.
The second half has started at Estadio de Sao Miguel.
In the minute 46, Free kick for Maritimo in their own half.
Manuel Mota signals a free kick to Santa Clara in their own half.
Jorge Correa for Maritimo has been booked by Manuel Mota and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 48, Manuel Mota awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Santa Clara in the half of Maritimo.
Osama Rashid of Santa Clara smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 50, Throw-in for Santa Clara at Estadio de Sao Miguel.
Ball safe as Maritimo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in high up the field for Santa Clara in Ponta Delgada.
In the minute 51, Santa Clara have been awarded a corner by Manuel Mota.
Throw-in Maritimo.
In Ponta Delgada a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 53, Santa Clara awarded a throw-in in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Ponta Delgada.
Throw-in for Santa Clara in the half of Maritimo.
In the minute 55, Throw-in for Santa Clara close to the penalty box.
Santa Clara's Mikel Villanueva breaks free at Estadio de Sao Miguel. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Maritimo have a goal kick.
In the minute 56, It's a goal kick for the home team in Ponta Delgada.
Goal kick for Maritimo at Estadio de Sao Miguel.
Can Santa Clara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Maritimo's half?
In the minute 57, Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Thiago Santana.
Mansur instrumental with a fine assist.
Throw-in for Maritimo in their own half.
In the minute 60, Corner awarded to Maritimo.
Maritimo to take a throw-in in Santa Clara territory.
Maritimo are coming forward and Fabio China gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 61, Ball goes out of play for a Santa Clara goal kick.
Maritimo make their first substitution with Rodrigo Pinho replacing Dejan Kerkez.
Throw-in high up the field for Maritimo in Ponta Delgada.
In the minute 63, Manuel Mota signals a throw-in for Maritimo, close to Santa Clara's area.
Can Maritimo capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Santa Clara's half?
Maritimo have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 64, Milson is replacing Jorge Correa for the away team.
Santa Clara needs to be cautious. Maritimo have an attacking throw-in.
Corner awarded to Maritimo.
In the minute 66, Jean (Maritimo) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
Manuel Mota waits before resuming play because Marco Pereira for Santa Clara is still down.
Santa Clara's Marco Pereira is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 69, Maritimo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Maritimo at Estadio de Sao Miguel.
In the minute 70, Throw-in for Maritimo close to the penalty box.
The home team replace Costinha with Nene.
Can Maritimo capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Santa Clara's half?
Throw-in for Santa Clara in their own half.
In the minute 72, Free kick Santa Clara.
Thiago Santana heads in to give Santa Clara a 2-0 lead at Estadio de Sao Miguel.
That's a fine assist from Carlos Carvalho.
In the minute 74, Maritimo are pushing forward but Edgar Costa's finish is wide of the goal.
Manuel Mota awards Santa Clara a goal kick.
Manuel Mota signals a Maritimo throw-in in Santa Clara's half.
In the minute 75, Manuel Mota signals a free kick to Maritimo.
Maritimo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Daniel Ramos is making the team's second substitution at Estadio de Sao Miguel with Jean Patrick Lima dos Reis replacing Salomao.
In the minute 76, Francois Xavier Fumu Tamuzo is on a sub for Edgar Costa for Maritimo.
Maritimo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Santa Clara's Carlos Carvalho gets in a shot on goal at Estadio de Sao Miguel. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 78, Maritimo needs to be cautious. Santa Clara have an attacking throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Maritimo goal kick.
Santa Clara's Thiago Santana misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 79, Rodrigo Pinho of Maritimo gets in a strike, but is off target.
Santa Clara have a goal kick.
Manuel Mota awards Maritimo a goal kick.
In the minute 81, Throw-in Maritimo.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Ponta Delgada.
Can Santa Clara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Maritimo's half?
In the minute 83, Manuel Mota awards the away team a throw-in.
Manuel Mota signals a Maritimo throw-in in Santa Clara's half.
Santa Clara have been awarded a corner by Manuel Mota.
In the minute 85, Carlos Carvalho for Santa Clara gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Maritimo at Estadio de Sao Miguel.
Throw-in for Maritimo in the half of Santa Clara.
Maritimo make their fourth substitution with Rafik Guitane replacing Pedro Pelagio.
In the minute 86, The home team replace Thiago Santana with Cryzan.
Ball safe as Santa Clara is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 87, In Ponta Delgada Maritimo attack through Rodrigo Pinho. The finish is off target, however.
Manuel Mota awards Santa Clara a goal kick.
Manuel Mota signals a free kick to Maritimo in their own half.
In the minute 88, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Santa Clara in their own half.
6 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Ponta Delgada.
In Ponta Delgada a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Nanu (Maritimo) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Manuel Mota awards the away team a throw-in.
Maritimo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Maritimo's Nanu is on target but unsuccessful.
Ball safe as Maritimo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Maritimo in their own half.
Throw-in for Santa Clara at Estadio de Sao Miguel.
Throw-in Santa Clara.
The match is over. Final score 2-0.
